headline: India, UAE, and Saudi Arabia Set to Lead Global Aviation Growth – Avolon 2026 Outlook Paper
summary: DUBLIN, January 23, 2026--The continuation of low fuel prices and economic growth are expected to help global airline industry profits to reach US$41 billion in 2026, according to a paper published today by Avolon. This year is set to mark the fourth consecutive profitable year for the sector, helping airlines to recover over 80% of the US$182 billion lost during the pandemic.
